title: GPU not being used while faceset extract
body:
THIS IS NOT TECH SUPPORT FOR NEWBIE FAKERS
POST ONLY ISSUES RELATED TO BUGS OR CODE

## Expected behaviour
Extracting facesets will utilize the selected GPU (1050ti mobile) it will work with the integrated GPU (but slow af) Even tried the stock footage. 
## Actual behaviour

GPU utalization stuck a 0% and progress dose not move 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30854494/137264517-65bdbcde-c945-488d-b268-4415e0cc97e6.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30854494/137264833-e8cb2586-8bd5-4e50-b6bf-76a399de7e98.png)
## Steps to reproduce
Run the "4) data_src faceset extract.bat" 
Select the setting shown above  
Nothing happens on the progress 
Even tried the stock footage 
## Other relevant information
DeepFaceLab_DirectX12
Edition	Windows 10 Pro
Version	21H1
Installed on	‎1/‎02/‎2021
OS build	19043.1237
Experience	Windows Feature Experience Pack 120.2212.3530.0

Thanks, Lilly
